A soviet-era handheld flashlight. This particular model can be constructed in the field, though its usefulness is hampered by its tight light cone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Fuel: %c[ui_gray_2]Batteries

An object of unknown origin and purpose. Originally, this strange object emitted lethal psi-waves and was the cause of death to many unsuspecting stalkers who braved the northern areas. This one was modified by Sakharov and, with the help of a Moonlight artefact, became a source of limitless light.
